name: Brute Force
description: For the next action, one target ally deals 1d6 extra damage.

name: Burst Lightning
description: May be reforced by paying %reforce. Deals 2d6 damage to a target. If reforced, deals 4d6 instead. This reforced spell cannot be countered.

name: Crush
description: Destroy an artifact (object) on scene (success on a MAG saving throw).

name: Dual Shot
description: Deal 1d6 damage to up to 2 targets (Roll once for each target).

name: Electrickery
description: May be overloaded by paying %overload. Deal 1d6 damage to one target. If overloaded, roll MAG. If success, deal 1d6 to each and every enemy on field, otherwise, the damage is dealt to everyone, even allies.
